title: IESCO to ensure uninterrupted power supply during Eidul Azha: Naeem Jan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 05 (APP):Islamabad Electric Supply Company (IESCO) Chief Executive Muhammad Naeem Jan on Thursday said that IESCO will ensure uninterrupted power supply during the Eid holidays. All necessary operational arrangements have been finalized in this regard.
He also extended Eidul Azha greetings to the esteemed IESCO consumers and stated that, senior officers along with staff will be present at the Central Control Room to monitor the demand and supply of electricity on feeders, said a press release.
The operational formations will ensure the immediate resolution of individual and transformer-related complaints.
Chief Engineer Operations Muhammad Kashif Shah, as the focal person, will directly supervise all these operations.
IESCO Chief Muhammad Naeem Jan has requested consumers to avoid throwing sacrificial animal droppings near electrical installations as birds and animals come upon them, causing faults and tripping incidents on feeders.
Consumers can register their complaints on complaint office numbers printed on electricity bills, IESCO helpline 118, SMS service 118, or through the Complaint and Monitoring Cell at the following numbers 051-9252933, 051-9252934.
